content: Hi, procedural request: can we please limit the scope of the RFC to what's already covered? I've seen requests to add more stream adapters, and given the amount of discussion we had about whether to include next I think it'd be unwise if we opened this up further.

I'm eager to see Stream land as it's something people have been waiting years for. And we're the closest we've ever been! Expanding the scope of the RFC this late into the process could set us back which would be incredibly unfortunate.
This is a follow-up on this comment I've made on the RFC: https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2996#issuecomment-707593412
I need to go look at this thread, but I agree
ah, I see that the discussion is around try_next
